nodes.label: let cpi_accounts = Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . burn_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;

msg ! ("Burned {} token(s) from {} by {}" , amount , ctx . accounts . burn_nft_account . key () , ctx . accounts . user . key ()) ;
